entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
